system.description:
At 5th level, you gain the ability to manipulate the strands of fortune and fate. You may do so a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining expended uses on a long rest. Choose one of the following:

Witch’s Blessing

Witch’s Curse

When a creature you can see succeeds on an ability check, attack roll, or saving throws, you may use your reaction to apply a penalty equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.
